metadata.title: CVE-2022-34265 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Django 3.2 before 3.2.14 and 4.0 before 4.0.6.The Trunc() and Extract() database functions are subject to SQL injectionif untrusted data is used as a kind/lookup_name value. Applications thatconstrain the lookup name and kind choice to a known safe list areunaffected.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-34265` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 2:3.2.12-2ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:3.2.12-2ubuntu1.1').
